creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Gordon Brodfuehrer
description: funnel-shaped bowl: wide mouth tapers dramatically into narrow base; basket-weave glaze pattern with green and blue gradient; midnight blue with purple at base

 Bottom of the basin: [ 九谷正彦 ]
